title: Watch These Dogs Bravely Protect Professional Cyclists’ Bikes from the Evils of Power Washing
content:
Man’s best friend saves the day for DSM-Firmenich’s Pavel Bittner and Human Powered Health’s Henrietta Christie.

Read the full article at Watch These Dogs Bravely Protect Professional Cyclists’ Bikes from the Evils of Power Washing on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
